body.para: Change the setting that determines how dates without century digits are interpreted.
SET EPOCH is functionally equivalent to SetEpoch().

text.style: font-family:Arial; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
